bibl.title: Four Greek Ostraka from Deir el-Hagar.
bibl.note: Four ostraka discovered during the clearance of sand and debris from the temple at Deir el-Hagar, Dakhleh Oasis. 2nd century, but early 3rd century not excluded. - 1. Inv. 33/390-F9-1/G/1 (= EAO # 2198). Delivery of people, bundles of palm branches, etc. - 2. 33/390-F9-1/N/1 (= EAO # 2200). Idem. - 3. 33/390-F9-1/C/4 (= EAO # 2426). List of persons. - 4. 33/390-F9-1/C/5 (= EAO # 2427). A list?
MILLS Anthony J. and Klaas A. WORP, Four Greek Ostraka from Deir el-Hagar.
